name: Alec Bradley - Retreat - Toro
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley Retreat is a handmade cigar, which comes with a rich Honduran wrapper. The filler is a blend of Dominican, Nicaraguan, and Mexican long filler. I straight clipped the cap with my cigar scissors and found a near perfect draw with a sweet tobacco flavor. The wrapper had a barnyard aroma and the foot smelled of aged tobacco with a hint of molasses.
